MathMLElementMsubsup.summary: The <msubsup> MathML element is used to attach both a subscript and a superscript, together, to an expression.

remarks.para: It uses the following syntax: <msubsup> base subscript superscript </msubsup>.

-{{ MathMLElement("msub") }} (Subscript)
-{{ MathMLElement("msup") }} (Superscript)
-{{ MathMLElement("mmultiscripts") }} (Prescripts and tensor indices)
